Body: Here is what I want to do:In skype I have contacts: A,B,CIn android I use phone memory populated with google contacts: C,D,EMy goal is to display in my contact list users C,D,E with option to call in skype for contact C (as common for both list).What I do:  After installing skype: Sync contacts A,B,C(skype),C(google),D,E appear in phone contactsI merge contact CUnmark "show Skype contacts" in phone contacts settingsEverything works as I want: C(merged),D,EBUT When I restart skype I see the list in phone contacts like: A,B,C(merged),D,EHow can I achieve my goal even after restarting skype?
Title: Adding Contacts From Skype

history.Text: Here is what I want to do:  In skype I have contacts: A,B,C  In android I use phone memory populated with google contacts: C,D,E  My goal is to display in my contact list users C,D,E with option to call in skype for contact C (as common for both list).  What I do:   - After installing skype: Sync contacts  - A,B,C(skype),C(google),D,E appear in phone contacts - I merge contact C - Unmark "show Skype contacts" in phone contacts settings - Everything works as I want: C(merged),D,E  BUT When I restart skype I see the list in phone contacts like: A,B,C(merged),D,E   How can I achieve my goal even after restarting skype?
